author: The Pioneer
title: Dhoni, Deepika, saints in list of invitees for Ram temple consecration
text: Shri Ram Janmbhoomi Teerth Kshetra (Ayodhya) has also extended invitations to cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, ace archer Deepika Kumari and two industrialists from State for the mega Ram Mandir Pran Pratishtha event in Ayodhya on January 22. Former Lok Sabha Deputy Speaker Karia Munda and Rajya Sabha Deputy Speaker Harivansh- are also in the guest list. Apart from these VVIPs and celebrities, over 62 saints of all religious and spiritual traditions have been invited from Jharkhand. The saints also include 20 tribal priests, like Santhal Gurubaba, Safahod, Baiga, Pahan, and Pujar, and heads of religious and spiritual organisations. Some of the saints includes Ram Akhand Das of Ramrekha Dham Simdega, Sardar Panda Gulab Nand Ojha of Baidyanath Dham, Shri Malay Sarkar from Thakur Anukul Chandra’s organisation, Swami Niranjananand from Rikhiya Peeth, Swami Bhuteshanand from Bharat Sevashram Sangh, Purnanand Maharaj from Advaita Sansthan Tupudana, and Sadhvi Sucheta Chaitanya from Chinmay Mission Bokaro. The list also includes Mrityunjay Baba from Ram Baba Ashram Seraikela, Sadhvi Gyananand from Kabir Gyan Mandir Giridih, Bal Krishna Baba from Maharishi Mehi Ashram Chutiya, Mahant Suryanarayan Das Mahatyagi from Sankat Mochan Mandir, Ranchi, Ancient Ram Temple, Mahant Gokul Das from Chutiya, Mahant Om Prakash Sharan from Tapovan Temple, and Laxmi Puri Ji from Rangdih Temple, Govindpur, Dhanbad. The list of tribal saints and priests includes Shashibhushan Das, Simdega, Chhattarsingh Munda, Khunti, Vijay Marandi Maharaj, Dumka, Guruwari Hembrom, Sadhvi Sivadasi, Gumla, Rekha Hembrom, Dumka and Baba Motilal Pahariya. The consecration of Lord Ramlala will take place on January 22 in the grand Ram temple being built in Ayodhya. Preparations are going on throughout the country for this event. The entire Jharkhand including the capital Ranchi is engaged in this preparation. The Akshats (holy rice) invited from Shri Ram Temple Ayodhya are being kept in various temples of the capital Ranchi. People are also being made to see it. All preparations are being made by Vishwa Hindu Parishad and BJP regarding the Pran Pratishtha program. Vishva Hindu Parishad's provincial joint secretary Jharkhand Ranganath Mahato said that invitation cards will be distributed from January 1 to 15. He told that a central plan for temple program has been made from the country to the villages. Work is being done accordingly. According to the Central Action Plan, work will be done in four phases. Accordingly, the life consecration program of Lord Ramlala will be celebrated. Vishva Hindu Parishad's provincial co-secretary Jharkhand Ranganath Mahato told the complete action plan. January 1 to 15: Picture of Ram temple, yellow Akshat from Ayodhya and invitation letter will be delivered to every house. 21 January: Temples from province to village will be decorated. There will be various types of religious programs. 22 January: When consecration and aarti will take place in the Ram temple of Ayodhya. At the same time, Aarti and religious rituals will take place in every temple. There is an appeal to the general public that on this day, consider the village in which they are staying as Ayodhya and consider the temple in which they are staying as Ram temple and participate in the program. Vishva Hindu Parishad's provincial joint secretary Jharkhand Ranganath Mahato said that according to the organization, Ranchi metropolis has been divided into 16 cities. There are 167 settlements in these 16 cities, where invitation cards will be distributed to every house. These 16 cities are - Agashe Nagar, Balmiki Nagar, Shivaji Nagar, Gandhi Nagar, Ram Nagan, Chanakya Nagar, Madhav Nagar, Vikram Aditya Nagar, Pratap Nagar, Gautam Budh Nagar, Swami Vivekananda Nagar Chowk, Vishwakarma Nagar, Govind Nagar.

author: The BaylorProud Team
title: A year in, the Hurd Welcome Center has become an anchor on Baylor’s campus
text: A year in, the Hurd Welcome Center has become an anchor on Baylor’s campus A year ago this time, Baylor was celebrating the opening of the brand-new Mark and Paula Hurd Welcome Center. Since then, the Hurd has become exactly what university leaders hoped it would become: the new “[front door to campus](https://www2.baylor.edu/baylorproud/2023/08/hurd-welcome-center-now-open-as-baylors-front-door-to-campus/),” and an important part of campus life for both current and prospective students, faculty, staff, and alumni. A quick look back at the Hurd’s first 12 months: After a ribbon-cutting ceremony, the Hurd held its first official event last September: [Howdy at the Hurd](https://www2.baylor.edu/baylorproud/2023/09/hurd-welcome-center-dedication-followed-by-howdy-at-the-hurd-celebration/), a new twist on [Baylor’s annual Texas welcome](https://www.instagram.com/reel/Cw9UpBlNGvl/) for new students. View this post on Instagram It quickly became the starting point for [campus visits](https://www2.baylor.edu/baylorproud/2023/10/campus-visits-offer-students-the-deepest-truest-look-at-the-baylor-experience/), the headquarters for [in-person Premiere events](https://www2.baylor.edu/baylorproud/2024/04/premiere-welcomes-thousands-of-future-bears-to-campus-for-open-house/) (welcoming prospective students and their families), and the first stop for visitors during [Family Weekend](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1702776310257349051) and [Homecoming](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1718035039043105260). Your first stop at [#BaylorHomecoming]?That’s easy: the new Hurd Welcome Center — here with info, photo ops, & more. [pic.twitter.com/FAD9OE5n2o]— Baylor University (@Baylor) [October 27, 2023] The Hurd has joined Pat Neff in being lit up for special occasions (like [9/11 remembrances](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1701416332024058332)), and is now an official McLennan County [voting location](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1721884334137962568). “The right to vote is the basic right without which all others are meaningless.” — LBJ President Livingstone & the First Gent got [#ElectionDay]started by casting the first ballot at the Hurd! ️[pic.twitter.com/ygX04o8rXY]— Baylor University (@Baylor) [November 7, 2023] The Hurd ballroom has hosted notable guest speakers (such as [Doris Kearns Goodwin](https://baylorlariat.com/2023/10/02/pulitzer-prize-winner-talks-leadership-at-beall-russell-lecture-in-the-humanities/)), important faculty and staff meetings (like the [fall events](https://strategicplan.web.baylor.edu/launch-events) that unveiled the university’s new strategic plan, Baylor in Deeds), and alumni events such as [Huddle at the Hurd](https://www.instagram.com/p/CyR_2VBp9sD/?img_index=1') (on Friday nights before select home football games). View this post on Instagram Graduating seniors were honored at the Hurd during [Senior Celebration](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1788706553274499386) last May, and then in the summer, it served as a [travel stop](https://x.com/Baylor/status/1809317600515535209) for visitors traversing I-35! As you head home down I-35 this weekend, take a break and stop by the Hurd Welcome Center! ❄️ Stretch your legs (in A/C!) ☕️ Grab coffee, soda & sweet treats Clean restrooms Free Baylor travel pack for kids!Details: [https://t.co/OQovFX60hd][pic.twitter.com/MwuxqboXdn]— Baylor University (@Baylor) [July 5, 2024] If you still haven’t seen it for yourself, make plans to stop by during Homecoming, or just the next time you’re visiting Waco or driving down I-35. Sic ’em, Hurd Welcome Center!

author: Matthew Atungwu
title: Good Friday: Catholic Bishop urges leaders, Nigerians to emulate Jesus’ sacrifice
text: The Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Oyo, Most Rev. Emmanuel Badejo, has called on leaders and Nigerians to emulate Christ’s sacrifice as Christians

author: Оксана Стрелкова
title: Агроном, геолог, IOS разработчик: кому на Юге готовы платить более 200 тыс. рублей
text:
В Краснодаре открыта вакансия главного агронома с зарплатой от 269 тыс. рублей (до вычета налогов). В обязанности специалиста будет входить, руководство персоналом, контроль качества продукции овощеводства и обеспечение выполнения планов. Обязательно наличие высшего образование, опыт работы от 5 лет и готовность к релокации в пгт Солнечнодольск.
В Рустов-на-Дону ищут senior flutter developer с зарплатой от 200 тыс рублей (до вычета налогов). Специалисту предстоит осуществить ревью требований на их реализуемость, планирование задач, разработка приложений электронной коммерции и код-ревью. Необходим опыт мобильной разработки от 3 лет, владение bloc, понимание cubit/provider и опыт сборки приложений для IOS и Android.
В Краснодаре ищут заместителя директора по строительству с зарплатой от 267 тыс. рублей (на руки). В обязанности входит работы по строительству, рациональное распределение ресурсов, разработка планов по строительству, контроль за исполнением законов об охране окружающей среды. К требованию относится наличие высшего образования и опыт работы от 3 лет.
В Ростов- на-Дону требуется ведущий геолог с зарплатой от 360 тыс. (на руки). Необходимо участие в геологических исследованиях при проведении ГГР, планировании работ и разработке документации. От кандидата требуется опыт работы от 5 лет, знание геологической отчетности и требования регуляторов по данному направлению.
В Краснодаре открыта вакансия на работу IOS разработчика с зарплатой от 200 тыс. (на руки). В обязанности входит разработка мобильных приложений, требуется опыт работы от 2 лет, опыт разработки мобильных приложений под IOS, знание Swift и паттернов проектирования.
В Ростов- на-Дону ищут инженера ПТО с зарплатой от 300 тыс. рублей (на руки). Необходим опыт работы от 2 лет в строительстве или промышленности, высшее образование и знание нормативной базы. В обязанности входит подготовка документации, взаимодействие с подрядчиками/заказчиками и контроль соответствия работ и норм СНиП/СП.
В Краснодаре в поисках финансового директора с зарплатой от 400 тыс. рублей (на руки). В обязанности входит руководство финансовой службой, разработка стратегии и работа с банками, планирование инвестиционной политики. Необходим опыт работы от 5 лет в девелоперских или строительных компаниях, высшее образование в сфере финансов/бухгалтерского учета, опыт проектного финансирования КРТ.
В Ростове-на-Дону предлагают работу программиста 1С с зарплатой от 250 тыс. рублей (на руки). Требуется доработка и поддержка пользователей 1С, доработка конфигураций 1С: ERP, УТ, БП. Необходим опыт программирования в среде 1С от 3 лет, опыт работы с СУБД MySQL, MS SQL и http запросами.

author: @KMOV
title: Man celebrates last day of work after 48 years at supermarket chain
text: Man celebrates last day of work after 48 years at supermarket chain WEST DES MOINES, Iowa (KCCI) - For an Iowa man, the start of 2024 will bring a lot of change to his normal routine as he retires from supermarket chain Hy-Vee after almost five decades. It’s not every day Steve Mick gets chauffeured around, but after 48 years at Hy-Vee, Sunday was his last day and his boss insisted on the special ride to work. Outside the West Des Moines supermarket was a display celebrating Mick’s years of service. “That’s amazing,” Mick said. “Wow. It’s about all I can say.” Inside the store, countless hugs and congratulations from family, friends and former colleagues showed the impact Mick had on the community. He started at Hy-Vee behind the meat counter in 1975 when he was just 16. “He’s the same person today: extremely nice, extremely thoughtful, willing to help the customers,” longtime colleague Marilyn Cook said. “He’s been such a hard worker all his life, and today is kind of a bittersweet day for all of us,” said Mick’s daughter, Kerri Driscoll. Mick worked at different Hy-Vee locations throughout his career, his last being the store in West Des Moines on Jordan Creek Parkway. “It was just a place that fit for me,” Mick said. “Been a long haul, and it’s been well worth it.” As the chapter at Hy-Vee comes to an end, the cake at Mick’s party is a hint as to what part of retirement looks like: camping and time in nature with family. “I’m going to let life happen to me, enjoy every minute of it,” Mick said. Mick’s co-workers say he will be missed after bringing smiles to people during his nearly five decades on the job. Copyright 2024 KCCI via CNN Newsource. All rights reserved.

author: sina.com.cn
title: 传小米汽车App内测"安全分Beta"系统，助力驾驶者打造安全高效出行|小米|分数_新浪科技_新浪网
text:
近日，据相关媒体报道，小米汽车App正紧锣密鼓地进行一项名为“安全分Beta”系统的内测工作。该系统旨在通过大数据与人工智能技术的深度融合，为车主提供全面而精准的安全评估与优化建议，从而帮助每一位驾驶者实现更安全、更高效的出行体验。
“安全分Beta”系统作为一种创新的功能模块，其核心在于通过综合分析用户的驾驶习惯、车辆实时状态以及外部环境数据，生成一个介于0至100分之间的安全评分。这一评分直观反映了用户的整体行车安全性，为驾驶者提供了一个量化的安全参考标准。
据小米汽车App相关负责人介绍，“安全分Beta”系统不仅是一个评估工具，更是一个动态反馈与激励机制的完美结合。通过实时反馈安全分数，系统能够引导用户主动发现并改善不良驾驶习惯，从而在源头上降低事故风险。通常情况下，安全分数越高，意味着驾驶者的行车安全性越高，也代表着其驾驶行为更加规范、稳健。
在安全分的计算规则方面，小米汽车App采用了科学的里程加权计算方法，确保评估结果的准确性和公正性。具体而言，安全分数是基于用户在一定时间周期内的驾驶行为数据，结合里程数据进行综合计算得出的。这一过程中，系统考虑了多个安全因子，包括激进转向、急减速、不系安全带、前碰撞预警以及分心与疲劳驾驶等五大维度。这些安全因子的占比越高，用户的安全分数就会相应降低，从而提醒用户关注并改进相关驾驶行为。
值得一提的是，为了确保安全分系统的准确性和合理性，小米汽车App在智能驾驶期间（包括智能驾驶退出后的5秒内）的驾驶数据并不会纳入安全分的计算范围。这一设计旨在避免因智能驾驶系统的介入而对用户安全分数产生不必要的干扰，确保评估结果的客观性和准确性。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing
Economy, Business and Finance->products and services
